#summary This document contains guidlines for Google projects looking to be added to the repository

= Absolute, Unwavering Requirements =

 * Your project *must* have the [http://code.google.com/hosting/search?q=label:Google google label]
 * Your project's POM needs to be reviewed by a Google Maven Repository project owner

= Approval Needed =

  * If you do not inherit from the com.google:google POM
     {{{
  <parent>
    <groupId>com.google</groupId>
    <artifactId>google</artifactId>
    <version>1</version>
  </parent>
     }}}

= Suggestions =

 * Life is easier if your project builds with maven, but it is not required
